attributes.action: stop the allowed discrimination of the LGBT community by registrars opting out of Civil Partnerships due to religious beliefs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A Registar from Islington Council won her tribunal and will be able to opt out of performing ivil Partnerships on the grounds that it is against her beliefs.

This is a public service and all of the UK residents should be entitled to the same service reguardless of their sexual orientation.

If people can not opt out of goods or service on these grounds why should it apply here?

Additionally it is not a gay wedding, the law states Civil Partnership.

Prime Minister we ask that you step in and stop this discrimination.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
